description:
Tree pruning in the Hillmarton Conservation area

(T numbers used as shown on application for tree works site plan)

T1 Apple, 20 % crown reduction and deadwood.
T2 Prunus, lightly prune to shape.
T3 Prunus, lightly prune to shape.
T4 Ash, 20 % crown thin, remove branch over yellow building, cut back to clear building at the end of the garden by 2 m and deadwood.
T5 Purple Plum, lightly prune to shape.
T6 Cherry, 20 % crown reduction, lift crown to 3 m and deadwood.
T7 Cherry, fell.

All trees are located in the rear garden of 10 Hillmarton Road, N7 9JW.
decision_conditions: The council expects to see a replacement tree planted in a location close to the Cherry that is to be removed, but further from the boundary wall to prevent damage in the future. The species and size is to be agreed with the Tree Preservation Officer prior to planting. Replacement tree is be planted within one planting season.
